subject: Heap size
msgSnippet: I have some tests that require relatively large heap sizes to complete (eg 800MB). It would be useful to have an annotation to express this so that a runner
messageBody:
I have some tests that require relatively large heap sizes to complete
(eg 800MB). It would be useful to have an annotation to express this so
that a runner could either fail early or fork a JVM with a suitable heap.

Regards
Mark Thornton
